niagara.physical
Class PhysicalWindowCount

java.lang.Object
  niagara.optimizer.colombia.Op
      niagara.optimizer.colombia.PhysicalOp
          niagara.physical.PhysicalOperator
              niagara.physical.PhysicalWindowGroup
                  niagara.physical.PhysicalWindowAggregate
                      niagara.physical.PhysicalWindowCount
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable, Initializable, Instrumentable, Schedulable, SchemaProducer, SerializableToXML
public class PhysicalWindowCount
extends PhysicalWindowAggregate

This is the PhysicalCountOperator that extends the PhysicalGroupOperator with the implementation of Count (a form of grouping)

Version:
1.0
